p: Preoperative adjuvant chemotherapy with cisplatin (CDDP) and 5-fluorouracil (5FU) is currently used with beneficial effects to treat localized advanced ESCC in Japan. [ 2, 3, 10] We previously reported that TRPV2 appeared to play a role in maintaining CSCs, and that tranilast, its inhibitor, may enhance the effects of conventional preoperative adjuvant chemotherapy against ESCC. [ 7] The present study is being performed to confirm the safety and efficacy of the additional use of tranilast with 5-FU/CDDP and to develop a novel therapeutic strategy for patients with advanced ESCC.
